creator: Nimble Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The Nimble app is the only relationship manager and personal Agenda Tool you need. It combines your phone’s contacts and calendars with our rich people and company insights. Before every meeting, Nimble presents you with clear and concise contact and company details. Imagine, no more last minute scrambling before every meeting. Our Nimble mobile app will even help you to effectively follow up and follow through with your contacts via automated reminders to log notes and tasks.


FEATURES
* Our all new Agenda view presents your upcoming events and tasks in a clear and concise view.
* Get instant intel on your contacts within your CRM and phone book with social and company insights.
* Quickly create Events that sync to Nimble and your Google Calendar.
* Set push notifications to help you prepare for meetings.
* Set reminders to leave follow up notes after a meeting ends.
* Tasks to track your daily “To-Dos” and link them to contacts.
* Sync your phone contacts automatically or manually to your Nimble account.

ABOUT NIMBLE
Nimble makes it easy to engage by building the CRM database for you from the contacts, emails, calendar activities you and your team are connecting with. Nimble adds deep contact and company insights to each record and updates them daily to help you better understand and connect with customers. It searches the web and social networks to deliver insights about your contacts: mutual interests, shared passions, and important moments. Your critical business relationships will grow when you make Nimble an integral part of your business life.

FEATURED IN
Forbes: “Best for building true relationships”
Fortune: “Making CRM more social media-friendly”
Inc. Magazine: “A salesperson’s best friend”
Entrepreneur Magazine: Nimble named Top 100 Brilliant Companies - “Pulls together Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+, Twitter, e-mail, contacts & calendars into one brilliantly simple CRM.”
CODiE Award: Best Relationship Management Solution
ZDNet: CRM Watch List Winner
Mashable: “Help businesses and individuals create better connections”
PandoDaily: “Puts all social interactions between you & the customer in one place”
Social Media Examiner: “Nimble #1 - Social Media Tools That Improve the Sales Cycle”


Questions or comments? Email us at care@nimble.com. We would love to hear from you.

Follow us on Twitter at @Nimble or on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/nimble

title: Nimble Social Relationship CRM

descriptionHtml:

Before every meeting, Nimble presents you with clear and concise contact and company details. Imagine, no more last minute scrambling before every meeting. FEATURES
* Our all new Agenda view presents your upcoming events and tasks in a clear and concise view.
* Get instant intel on your contacts within your CRM and phone book with social and company insights.
* Quickly create Events that sync to Nimble and your Google Calendar.
* Set push notifications to help you prepare for meetings.
* Set reminders to leave follow up notes after a meeting ends.

ABOUT NIMBLE

title: Nimble Social Relationship CRM

creator: Nimble Inc.
descriptionHtml:
The Nimble app is the only relationship manager and personal Agenda Tool you need. It combines your phone’s contacts and calendars with our rich people and company insights. Before every meeting, Nimble presents you with clear and concise contact and company details. Imagine, no more last minute scrambling before every meeting. Our Nimble mobile app will even help you to effectively follow up and follow through with your contacts via automated reminders to log notes and tasks.


FEATURES
* Our all new Agenda view presents your upcoming events and tasks in a clear and concise view.
* Get instant intel on your contacts within your CRM and phone book with social and company insights.
* Quickly create Events that sync to Nimble and your Google Calendar.
* Set push notifications to help you prepare for meetings.
* Set reminders to leave follow up notes after a meeting ends.
* Tasks to track your daily “To-Dos” and link them to contacts.
* Sync your phone contacts automatically or manually to your Nimble account.

ABOUT NIMBLE
Nimble makes it easy to engage by building the CRM database for you from the contacts, emails, calendar activities you and your team are connecting with. Nimble adds deep contact and company insights to each record and updates them daily to help you better understand and connect with customers. It searches the web and social networks to deliver insights about your contacts: mutual interests, shared passions, and important moments. Your critical business relationships will grow when you make Nimble an integral part of your business life.

FEATURED IN
